website_summaries.verdict: Boasts all the must-have travel tray features plus a built-in board game. A budget-friendly option with impressive entertainment features.
pros: A wealth of storage pockets and straps keep toys, drawing supplies, pacifiers, bottles, and snacks within arm's reach
Tablet and smartphone strap for screen time
Easy to clean tray comes printed with a game of snakes and ladders
cons: Some owners noticed an unpleasant smell upon opening

customer_reviews.title: I searched a few days for the best seat tray for my 3 yr old on our ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I searched a few days for the best seat tray for my 3 yr old on our ip and coming road trip... by far I couldn't be more pleased. Talk about durable, extremely well made, and the dark green is awesome for hiding stains better than light colored trays. Thing I give high praise for it the high back wall feature. It only makes sense to have it higher than the rest of the side walls to better support a weighted tablet. Lol, even my husband likes using it with his laptop for that feature. Look forward to this trip and surprising my boy !
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: One side pocket
customer_reviews.text: The tray bends super easy and it only came with one side pocket not two like it’s pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had bought this sooner!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these before a recent road trip (over 2,700 miles) for our two toddlers and they LOVE them. The kids enjoyed eating on them, coloring on them and the trays were very useful in preventing their small toys from falling on the ground. The trays are very easy to clean and easy to set up. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: gators

customer_reviews.title: Good size, game is fun.
customer_reviews.text: I would gove this 5 stars, but it smells like cigarettes pretty stongly (though my wife thinks its a glue smell). We have an "ozone bag" used for hunting gear, so I tossed it in there for a few minutes and it cleared that smell up. Otherwise, its a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: After much research happy with my choice!
customer_reviews.text: Took my time deciding on which of these trays would be best for a long road trip for two toddlers. These are nice quality and have tall sturdy sides which worked well. Also like the “lip” that’s on the front so items don’t continuosly fall out the front. Both kids loved their “trays” and used them for the majority of the trip!
customer_reviews.author: Sara P.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for road trips!
customer_reviews.text: Used for a road trip. And we used these trays for tons of activities. We wouldnt have been able to do half of the things I brought without these trays. Plus great for a meal on the road too. My almost 4 year old had a tough time with the stretchy elastic cup holders. My 5 year old had no problem at all. I bought 2 of the same so they'd match. I am very happy with these! We've even done the game board a few times.
customer_reviews.author: Dan & Colleen Heuser

customer_reviews.title: Really useful tray. We travel a lot and every time ...
customer_reviews.text: Really useful tray. We travel a lot and every time we go somewhere, I wish we had one of these. And it made a world of difference on our last trip. I also really like the game on the tray. My little guy liked playing with the pieces, even though he doesn't really know how to play.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GOOD FOR LONG TRIPS
customer_reviews.text: We just took a 450 mile trip and the car seat tray was very useful. It sat well in my granddaughter's lap so we did not need to use the straps. She played with her toys on it and it was also very good when she was eating. The cupholder was another good feature as were the side mesh pockets. Overall it was very useful and it also saved my car seat from stains. Overall I am very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: JWV

customer_reviews.title: Great for trips, could be more solid
customer_reviews.text: I thought the desk part was a little soft, so if you want to write on it, as opposed to just playing around, it would be difficult and you would still need a book or something hard under your paper. This is fine for kids, but if they need a harder surface this may not work.
customer_reviews.author: SZ

customer_reviews.title: What every travelling toddler needs
customer_reviews.text: This is such a lifesaver. Kept all the toys / crayons / stickers etc in one place (not falling on the ground or down aisles during our 6 hour flight. Kept our toddler happy. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does its job fine.
customer_reviews.text: We used this on a road trip from L.A. to AZ (that's 6-8 hours for those calculating). They worked fine and everything was in reach for my kids. They were able to eat off of them too, but I would not say that they are easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Mb126

customer_reviews.title: It is as sturdy as it looks
customer_reviews.text: This was the most sturdy option I saw in my search. We had a 3 hour car ride with my 2.5 yr old. This was great for his activities. The cup holder was not a need for us as our car seat has cup holders but if you need to use this for your it is hard for little ones to reach. Very pleased. The game is also cute.
customer_reviews.author: A.P.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome idea and lots of space
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my 2 year old niece. I told my sister that if she didn't end up using that I would take it for my daughter. I love it! Sturdy and lots of space for different items. Including the board game was also a great idea. Very nice item
customer_reviews.author: Kayley15

customer_reviews.title: Great for Long Car Rides
customer_reviews.text: My three year old liked having this tray on our 7 hour car trip. The only downside is that it's not terribly sturdy. You can strap it around the car seat but that's not really practical.
customer_reviews.author: Shoe Lover

customer_reviews.title: Son like it and that's rx
customer_reviews.text: I gotta say, even if I don't like that the table it not as hard as I want it to be ( I understand why it's not too), my son liked it and he enjoyed to use it every day.... that's enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: Haroline De La Rosa-Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Great idea but doesn't fit my son's carseat
customer_reviews.text: I have a grace extend to fit convertible car seat. This product was not wide enough to fit and sagged in the middle and the pockets that are supposed to hang over the sides were up on the arms
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Even though my 20 months old daughter got tired of it after half hour, This is very well made and works good for a little while.
customer_reviews.author: MOMfor3

customer_reviews.title: ... for a road trip for my daughter and she loved it! She could color and play and all ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a road trip for my daughter and she loved it! She could color and play and all her little toys were whithin reach! Awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yes! Just what a busy kid needs for long and short trips.
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy during travel. Many pockets for writing utensils and fits most colouring books and writing pads. Loves the snakes and ladder game that comes with the tray. Would highly recommend. Super fast shipping and personal follow-up notes received from co-founder. A+.
customer_reviews.author: ZB

customer_reviews.title: Practical and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This tray is exactly what we needed for our 5-year-old to stay comfortably busy in the back on our longer drives. Worth it for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Kaplan

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t Sit Flat
customer_reviews.text: This was convenient but my it didn’t sit flat so it made it a little awkward for my son to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Very strong durable quality 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my Granddaughter for our road trip to Disney. It is made very well has lots of pockets for her markers, crayons and colored pencils. The snakes and ladder game is cute. We will have fun playing this. Overall I am very pleased and love it. I hope she will as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sd

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: This tray worked perfectly for what we needed and our son loves playing the game on the top.
customer_reviews.author: Sara B

customer_reviews.title: Snakes and Ladders!
customer_reviews.text: We have already played several games of the built in Snakes and Ladders with our little one. She loves it! Like the detachable side pockets and all the straps and pockets on the table itself to hold pens, paper, toys, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for our toddler
customer_reviews.text: It served 2 purposes, 1 entertained my toddler by keeping all his toys and food in a clean place and 2 kept him from kicking the DVD player between the seats. Very pleased and a must for long trips.
customer_reviews.author: eddie drachenberg jr

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!!!
customer_reviews.text: Life savers for a 10 hour road trip with the children.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Rollan

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I wish I would’ve bought it earlier. The only bad part is I wish it was a tad bit sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a little one for traveling and it worked great
customer_reviews.author: Chase Vines

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My boys loved these car seat trays on our last trip. They were able to hold all of their belongs. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Sutcliffe

customer_reviews.title: ... have not use it yet but it looks very good quality.
customer_reviews.text: We used this for our almost 30 hour trip. My son used it to eat, play and hold his tablet. We really liked it. It’s so easy to use. Very good material.
customer_reviews.author: GIS 🦋

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This came exactly as described and it will work perfectly for our long road trips. It’s sturdy and has pockets.
customer_reviews.author: AngieJ

customer_reviews.title: Great for road trips
customer_reviews.text: My 6 yr old son loved this on our recent road trip. I only wish it had a way to fold up more conveniently when not in use, but overall it was a hit!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glad we bought 2
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2, one for our 3 year old and one for our 16 month old. Both of them love it! Great for coloring on, playing with play dough, and keeping their drinks and snacks accessible.
customer_reviews.author: Nora

customer_reviews.title: My son likes it and it was really useful!
customer_reviews.text: Just must be for the long car trip. My son likes it and it was really useful!
customer_reviews.author: Olga Shk

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: No directions to put together but pretty easy. It was sturdy but my son hated it!
customer_reviews.author: mamatobe

customer_reviews.title: Smells like cigarettes!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two and they smell strongly of cigarette smoke.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quickly and good quality. The zippered piece that forms the edge ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and good quality. The zippered piece that forms the edge of the tray was a little difficult to get started but zipped fine once I got it going.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas O Morgan III

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Our two year old loved it for our 6 hour drive to the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Travel table
customer_reviews.text: Very roomy for toys and snacks. She definitely enjoyed it on the car ride. Worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: rachael

customer_reviews.title: Keeps them happy!
customer_reviews.text: This made a long road trip in the car a lot easier. It kept them occupied. Everything had a pocket so no lost pieces. I am glad I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Cubskrazy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for long car rides!
customer_reviews.text: Kids drop nothing! No more long arm reaches to sooth your screaming child!

customer_reviews.text: We went on a 4 hour ride and this thing was awesome my 2 yr grandson loved it.

customer_reviews.text: Works great for long car rides or just eating or playing on the go!

customer_reviews.text: I like that you can remove the pockets and leave the tray in the car.

customer_reviews.text: Great for our long car trip for the older kids.

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived as expected and is great quality - took off 2 stars because it reeked ...
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived as expected and is great quality - took off 2 stars because it reeked of cigarette smoke - irritated that a product for children smells like an ashtray upon arrival - planning to return for this reason
customer_reviews.author: PG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 5 and 2yr olds!
customer_reviews.text: We took a long plane trip to visit family recently and this travel tray was a huge hit with our kids. They took turns using it while the other was napping and it kept them both busy for the whole trip. Loved that it could hold snacks and sippy cup, crayons, and other craft supplies. Lots of pockets to hold all their stuff in place
customer_reviews.author: CBabinet

product_meta.title: Premium Kids Car Seat Tray - Bonus SNAKES + LADDERS Game & Dice | Reinforced Base + Walls | Detachable Kids Travel Tray | Portable Toddler Travel Activity Tray | Foldable Baby Car Tray For Kids In Car
feature_bullets: KEEP KIDS ENTERTAINED. ANYWHERE. ANYTIME - Capture your child's interest for hours with our mobile car seat travel tray. Ideal for use whilst traveling in a stroller, car, airplane or train. Can also be used at home, in a restaurant, or at preschool.

VERSATILE SNACK AND ACTIVITY ZONES - Our premium travel organizer tray incorporates; stretchable mesh pockets, elastic drink bottle holders, flexible straps for technology / tablets, and multiple storage areas for pencils, pens, crayons, markers, books, coloring books, pacifiers, and toys.

BONUS SNAKES AND LADDERS BOARD GAME - Includes safari themed game, counters and dice. All products have been created with your child's safety in mind with oversized game accessories. Our snakes and ladders board game has been printed on the bottom of each travel tray to produce a multifunctional product. Create happy memories and quality family time on the go!

EXTRA DURABLE AND EASY TO CLEAN SURFACES - Made with 600 denier polyester, our car seat tray features a robust base, sturdy side walls, strong buckles, industrial grade zips, high quality stitching, and straps that can be adapted to clip around the back of most booster seats. The walls and pockets are designed to easily be detached for cleaning. Our car tray can be flat packed - simply unzip all walls and unclip straps for effortless storage.

PERFECT GIFT IDEA - Perfect gift idea for babies, infants, toddlers, nieces, nephews and friends to celebrate the holidays, birthdays, or baby showers. Plus a 30 DAY MONEY BACK GUARANTEE, just in case you're not satisfied with your purchase.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars88 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
